content: k1 repeat last 2 rnds 6 more times round 15 decrease round slmm k1 or p1 ssk work 2x2 rib to 2 sts before mm k2tog round 16 same as round 2 decrease rnds repeat round 1 & 2 3 times then repeat round 15 & 16 once more repeat decrease rnds 7 7 8 8 9 9 more times or to your desired length next round k around next round reverse the k and p from 2 rnds before repeat last round 19 more times ©︎ 2019 yuko shimizu 7 bobble all sts using ordinary bind-off method cut yarn finishing sew 6 buttons weave in ends and block to measurements mock turtle neck version only fold back the neck and sew on thank you thank you very much for your great help dear ayumi keiko oggi rita and tomomi if you have any questions about this pattern please contact me yuko shimizu 120@gmail com yuko shimizu ©︎ 2019 yuko shimizu 8
